 2022-05292022-05-19,  ,  ,  ,  ,  ECCC, 
ActGreenhouse Gas Pollution Pricing Act
SubjectCanadian Greenhouse Gas Offset Credit System Regulations
PrecisCANADIAN GREENHOUSE GAS OFFSET CREDIT SYSTEM REGULATIONS in order to (1) establish a federal offset system administered by the Department of the Environment; and (2) establish the conditions for registering a project in the system and the requirements for proponents, for the issuance of offset credits, as well as for keeping and maintaining records.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2022-0111 Publication Date: 2022-06-08
AttachmentsAttachment
